category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_perform_signoff
preference.preference_description: Activates the perform signoff performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the perform signoff to the insertion of the process's next task into all target inboxes. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the perform signoff performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the perform signoff performance transaction.
